penalties.name: Binding Butt
penalties.descriptionText: Smash butt on binding during landing.

penalties.name: Forget Claim
penalties.descriptionText: Caught passing Extreme Benches without announcing your day’s point total.

penalties.name: Flailing Lagger
penalties.descriptionText: Crash or equivalent prevents you from keeping up with group.

penalties.name: Get Poached
penalties.descriptionText: Get poached as you stand on top of a line in this book getting ready to drop in.

penalties.name: Goggles and Hat
penalties.descriptionText: Lose both goggles and hat in a crash.

penalties.name: Gaper Gap
penalties.descriptionText: Caught with gap between hat/helmet and goggles.

penalties.name: Huck Neck
penalties.descriptionText: Whiplash sustained while skiing designated line.

penalties.name: Hot Tub
penalties.descriptionText: Big crater or hip check >3 seconds.

penalties.name: Jellyfish
penalties.descriptionText: Totally limp and unconscious body sliding downhill.

penalties.name: Line Pause
penalties.descriptionText: Pause for more than 3 seconds in line. May be cancelled by yelling 'Hey, look at me!'.

penalties.name: Lose Ski
penalties.descriptionText: Lose a ski in a crash.

penalties.name: Nice Patrol
penalties.descriptionText: Get caught by patrol but they let you go.

penalties.name: Racer Boot
penalties.descriptionText: Pants rolled up so that top buckles are showing.

penalties.name: Ride with Chick
penalties.descriptionText: Riding with significant other on powder day.

penalties.name: Stabbed
penalties.descriptionText: Stabbed by pen or pencil in pocket.

penalties.name: Scorpion
penalties.descriptionText: Belly flop where your feet fly over your back and almost kick you in the back of the head.

penalties.name: Weird Crash
penalties.descriptionText: Crash that doesn’t fall into any of the above categories.

penalties.name: Yard Sale
penalties.descriptionText: Tomahawk leaving at least two pieces of equipment behind.

ecps.name: After 3pm
ecps.descriptionText: Perform any line in this book after 3pm.

ecps.name: Butt Naked
ecps.descriptionText: Complete line butt naked. If jailed, you lose your points.

ecps.name: Cat Track Gap
ecps.descriptionText: Gap jump a cat track.

ecps.name: Ego Claim
ecps.descriptionText: After skiing a designated line, go over to a group of strangers who were watching and claim, 'I’m the best skier on the mountain!'

ecps.name: F. Bag
ecps.descriptionText: Be the first to spot someone wearing a one piece suit.

ecps.name: First of Year
ecps.descriptionText: The first person to ski a line in this book this year.

ecps.name: Lagger
ecps.descriptionText: Lag behind and hold up the group.

ecps.name: Old School
ecps.descriptionText: Successfully complete a designated line wearing skis 215 cm or longer or an old school snowboard.

ecps.name: Pole Whacker
ecps.descriptionText: Vigorously whack your pole above a line for at least 30 seconds.

ecps.name: Rope Air
ecps.descriptionText: Jump over any rope. Rope must be above ground.

ecps.name: Radness Yell
ecps.descriptionText: Before dropping into a line, vigorously wave arms while yelling at the top of lungs, 'Hey! Check me out! I’m going to rip the shit out of this line.'

ecps.name: Snowball
ecps.descriptionText: Hit rider, attempting one of the designated lines, with a snowball. Rider must have pushed-off.

ecps.name: Steal Clothes
ecps.descriptionText: Steal the clothes of the person doing a BN and make them ride back to the base of the chair lift.

ecps.name: Talk Smack
ecps.descriptionText: In a serious tone, without laughing, and just prior to dropping into a designated line, tell a st anger next to you, 'I’m better than you!'

ecps.name: Urinate Line
ecps.descriptionText: If designated 700 or higher, stop mid-line and urinate. Must empty bladder.

ecps.name: Froot Lingerie
ecps.descriptionText: Froot Boot through the terrain park hitting all the jumps, wearing only women’s lingerie top and panties for three runs.

ecps.name: Goggle Tan
ecps.descriptionText: Ask any stranger which player in your group has the darkest, most defined goggle tan. Winner gets points.

ecps.name: Pro Call Out
ecps.descriptionText: To any pro, yell, 'Hey (name), I can’t believe you’re a pro. I’m totally better than you!'

ecps.name: Mom Line
ecps.descriptionText: Talking to your mother on a cell phone (without headset), stick a line worth 500 or greater.

ecps.name: Mono Skiing
ecps.descriptionText: Go monoskiing all day long.

ecps.name: Pass Picture
ecps.descriptionText: Obtain a totally ridiculous season pass picture. 3 or more friends must say 'How did they let you do that?' or equivalent.
